title: Love and Forgiveness Triumph Over Hate and Revenge
description:
This is my third, (and perhaps final, at least for a while), video on Homer's Iliad. In this one, I try to really get down to the differences between Love and Hate. There are a lot of other ways you could frame it: longsuffering versus anger, forgiveness versus revenge, etc. This is the fundamental divide in the Iliad, and, perhaps, in existence itself (not to sound too dogmatic). 

1st Iliad video: https://youtu.be/ZjYv-VYzeA4
2nd Iliad video: https://youtu.be/PppUe2XvZpY

This is episode 55 of my podcast. 

My Writing: https://coltonkirby.substack.com/

There is an audio version of my videos (on all podcast platforms): https://anchor.fm/coltonkirby

About Me: https://coltonkirby.substack.com/about?utm_source=menu-dropdown
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/coltonjkirby/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/_coltonkirby
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/officialcoltonkirby/
Odysee: https://odysee.com/@ColtonKirby
